title: Eee7 v1.1 - Windows 7 for your Netbook !
description:
ModMyEee Presents..................... EEE 7 v1.1



** This version is the same as 1.0, I just removed the file "Autounatended.xml" from the ISO because many people were having problems while installing. If you downloaded the v1.0, simply delete that file and it should fix your problem. **

------------------------------------

Eee 7 is the state-of-the-art lite version of Windows 7 for your Netbook. 
It works in every netbook out there, from the Eee PC 7" 4GB, to the latest Sony Vaio P Series. No major functionality was removed. ALL networking abilities were not touched. No hardware support war removed. Some of the things removed include old Drivers, games, asian languages (can be added later), help files, and others.

It's based on the latest version (7068) of Windows 7.


If you have any questions please post them in our FORUMS.

------------------------------------


System Requirements : 

4GB of HDD (8GB+ Recommended)

256mb RAM (1GB Recommended) 

Vista Drivers for your Netbook model (They will be compatible with Eee7)


------------------------------------

Important Information ! 


* When installing Eee7, the final phase of the setup (Finalizing Installation) can take very long depending on your computer. Just be patient.


* This version is the same as 1.0, I just removed the file "Autounatended.xml" from the ISO because many people were having problems while installing. If you downloaded the v1.0, simply delete that file and it should fix your problem.


* The Bootscreen will only be the new one when you finish installing all the necessary drivers. 





* To get Cable LAN working (WiFi works "out of the box") on the EeePC 7", follow the steps below: Download the Eee PC Ethernet Driver from the ASUS website and install it. (Or get it HERE)

-> Go to Control Panel, System, Device Manager, and choose "Ethernet Controller". 

-> Click on "update driver".

-> Select "Browse your computer for the driver software".

-> Go to the folder where you extracted the driver, go to lan/ Attansic/vista_32/ and select l260x86.inf.

-> Install it and you are ready to go !


-------------------------------------
